content.raw:
it was from an email chain that you started:

~~~
Slight complication with Qt5.
I believe, and someone should confirm, that libqwt-qt5 is not released in trusty.
This means if we integrate both QT5 and Plotting into gazebo8,
we'd have to disable plotting for trusty or build gazebo with qt4 when using trusty.
~~~

Confirming that `libqwt-qt5-dev` is not in trusty:

* http://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial/libqwt-qt5-dev
content.html:
it was from an email chain that you started:

Slight complication with Qt5.
I believe, and someone should confirm, that libqwt-qt5 is not released in trusty.
This means if we integrate both QT5 and Plotting into gazebo8,
we'd have to disable plotting for trusty or build gazebo with qt4 when using trusty.

Confirming that libqwt-qt5-dev is not in trusty:

  • http://packages.ubuntu.com/xenial/libqwt-qt5-dev
